help.title: Help
help.addBookText: To add a new book to your library, click the "Add Book" button and fill in the required fields.
help.favoriteTitle: How to mark a book as favorite
help.favoriteText: In the book view, click the star icon of any book to mark it as favorite.
help.statusTitle: How to change a book's status
help.statusText: You can change a book's status (Unread, Reading, Completed) directly from the book card, using the dropdown menu.
help.bug1: Export and import only work for .CSV file type, trying other types may cause errors.
help.bug2: The option to mark a book as Favorite is not yet functional.
help.bug3: If a book that has already been completed is manually marked as "Unread" or "Reading" in the "My Books" menu, it can be drawn. To prevent this, make sure the "Completed" option is marked on the book card.
help.bug4: Dark Mode doesn't have the correct colors implemented yet, wait for another version to use it.
help.bug5: The Search bar in the "My Books" menu is not working yet, we'll fix it in the future.
help.bug6: If sometimes the text boxes, like Edit Books, freeze and you can't click to write something, just switch windows in the operating system (go to another program and return to the ReadLuck window) as this will make the editing fields work normally again. We're working to fix this in future versions.
help.bug7: The English translation is not yet complete, you may find some parts that have not been translated.
